answerText: Andes mountains[10] This ethnic group is found primarily in the Andes and Altiplano of Peru and Bolivia. Most speakers of this ethnic group's language live in the basin of Lake Titicaca.
heading: PADAWAN |2014 | 15 | 7 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: This mountain range is home to the Quechua people. [10] Name this mountain range that contains the highest peak in South America, Mount Aconcagua. Cuzco and La Paz are both located in this mountain range.
